RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KHAKI JACK dueled for the lead on the inside and made a bid leaving the turn to kick clear, then remained clear to the wire to prove best, driving. NOLO CONTESTO tracked the pace in the two path, tipped out four wide for aim and finished well but could not get to the winner, second best. ASLUCKWOULDHAVIT dueled for the lead two wide and faded, bested rest. MAGIC SPIN chased the pace four wide, in between rivals on the turn, then rated back and came six wide into the lane and had no rally while gaining the last spot in the superfecta. CONDITION ONE bobbled at the start, chased the pace five wide and had no rally. A T M AWESOME was settled early, saved ground on the turn and had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Nolo Contesto
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, came 4 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Khaki Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, bid upper stretch, kicked clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: A T M Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Asluckwouldhavit
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, faded, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Spin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, between turn, came 6 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Condition One
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, chased pace 5 wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M 70Y Turf CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadv isable by managementto run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA PAZ stalked the pace two wide, made a bid off the turn and had a long drive and got up late to prevail under a drive. CABAR SUL was away alertly to set the pace on the inside, sent down leaving the turn and dug in gamely in the furlong grounds but was caught late to just miss. AIRMAN was settled two to three wide, four wide by the quarter pole while making a move, then rallied in the lane but needed more. BENCH PRESS was well rated on the inside, swung out three wide leaving the turn for aim, then angled back in nearing the sixteenth marker and had no kick. RIVERBOAT BANDIT was settled on the inside and lacked a rally. KAZ MUNNINGS stalked the pace three wide and tired. COMBATING was taken back early on the inside and had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: La Paz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, long drive, up late, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Airman
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2-3 wide, 4 wide 1/4 pole, rallied, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Cabar Sul
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, dug in gamely, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Combating
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back early, saved ground, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Bench Press
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, swung 3 wide upper, angled in 1/16, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Kaz Munnings
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 87. Claiming Purse 19900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Ent ered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at Five Furl ongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAB THE GOLD chased the pace six wide, made a four wide bid on the turn to go on even terms for command by the quarter pole, then continued that bid to edged clear by the sixteenth marker and then held off the closing FLASHINTHENIGHT to prevail under a drive. FLASHINTHENIGHT chased the pace two wide, advanced on the turn and swung out five wide leaving the turn and closed well. CASH IN A FLASH set a pressured pace and then dueled for the lead on the inside and yielded late, bested rest. SPIKES SHIRL pressed the pace two wide and came three wide into the lane but faded in the drive. NAUTICAL NATURE was rated along the inside and saved ground on the turn and had no rally. ACT OF VALOR was settled back early, shifted out four wide by the three eighths marker, passed the tiring rivals. GONE INZANE chased the pace five wide, then checked leaving the three eighths marker and dropped back. STANHOPE tracked the pace four wide early and weakened. KING ECLIPTICAL fractious in the gate, stalked the pace three wide and then was empty. The TRAINER and JOCKEY on number nine GONE INZANE filed an OBJECTION against the winner for interference at the three eighths marker, after the STEWARDS reviewed the replays the OBJECTIONS were not allowed and the race was left as is.

ENTRY.NAME: Flashinthenight
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 2 wide, swung 5 wide, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Nautical Nature
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, saved ground turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Cash in a Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, dueled inside, yielded late

ENTRY.NAME: Spikes Shirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, came 3 wide, faded stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Act of Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, shift 4 wide 3/8, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: King Ecliptical
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable and Martin Kaci
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, stalked pace 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Stanhope
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Gone Inzane
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 5 wide, checked 3/8 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 6 wide, bid 4 wide, long drive, prevailed, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M 70Y Turf CR: 74. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadv isable by managementto run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUCHINCRUIVE was well rated throughout, two wide on the turn, came three wide into the lane and made a bid under left handed crop urging to draw clear late to prove best. THE MAN TO SEE steadied into the first turn while under a tight hold, then pulled while on the first turn, finally settled on the backstretch, made a two wide bid off the turn and fought it out with the pacesetter through the lane but was outfrinished by the winner while winning the battle for the place award. RED DEVOLUTION set the pace on the inside and was well handled, dug in through the lane and gave way grudgingly, bested rest. LAST SECOND LOUIE was four wide into the first turn, stalked the pace three to two wide, made a bid on the turn but drifted out and came four wide into the lane and weakened. SPEAK OF THE DEVIL tracked the pace two wide and tired. DON'T QUESTION ME was settled early and stopped. DR GREENTHUMB showed little. Race was HAND TIMED due to operator error.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Greenthumb
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Auchincruive
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 2 wide turn, came 3 wide, bid, drew clear late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Norman G. Lewis & Laurence B. Lewis

ENTRY.NAME: The Man to See
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied first turn, pulled, hard held inside,bid 2 wide,held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Speak of the Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Last Second Louie
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, stalked 3 wide, came 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Devolution
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, well handled, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Question Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 79. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SYNONYM was away alertly to set the pace on the inside, well rated throughout, had the reins shaken leaving the turn and responded well to open up and then drew off in the lane to prove much the best to score under a hand ride. CATTY'S UNCLE stalked the winner three wide, made a two wide bid on the turn but could not go with the winner while saving the place award. LUCKY RUNNING CAT was well placed on the inside and weakened, bested rest. EYE ON THE CANDY chased the early pace, three wide on the turn and weakened. SHIFTINGGEARS was dwelt at the start, far back and was never a threat. FLETCHER STATION was settled early, three wide on the turn and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Shiftinggears
ENTRY.COMMENT: dwelt start, far back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Synonym
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, well handled, drew off, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Running Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Catty's Uncle
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 2 wide, no match, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Eye On the Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Fletcher Station
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, 3 wide turn, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Olde r, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATHENA BEACH was away alertly to set a pressured pace on the inside while under a good hold, then was given his cue leaving the turn and roused by the furlong marker and held on gamely to prove best. KNICKERSINATWIST was bumped at the start, pressed the winner and made a three wide bid off the turn, fought willingly to the wire but was outfinished. DATE NIGHT KISSES stalked the pace and made a four wide bid nearing the quarter pole, then came five wide into the lane and ran on to the wire but needed more, bested rest. TAPIT'S GIRL tracked the pace in between rivals early, came three wide into the lane while with in range but faded the final furlong. BELLA PRIMA was well placed on the inside and faded. TODO SOLA was bumped hard at the start, chased the pace, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. MOONSAFE was bumped at the start, settled early, came wide into the lane and had no rally. QUEEN'S DREAM broke outwardly and bumped rivals at the start, lost irons also and trailed. Number eight DATE NIGHT KISSES ran first time blinkers on despite not being noted in the program.

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Prima
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, saved ground turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Queen's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, bumped rival, lost irons, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Todo Sola
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start, chased pace, came 5 wide, no excuse,

ENTRY.NAME: Moonsafe
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, allowed to settle, came wide upper stretch,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Athena Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside, sent down, held gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Tapit's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, came 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Knickersinatwist
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable Jackson Stephen G and Jackson Debbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed 3 wide, bid 3 wide, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Date Night Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, ran on, bested rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 13100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 21. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races W here Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOMATER GATOR vied for the early lead two wide, shook clear on the inside, then was on the inside, was headed off the turn and passed nearing the furlong marker, then was resurgent to edged clear late to prove best under a drive. FEDERAL CASE was settled early, then finished well on the inside to gain the place award late. ANNAMATED MOON vied for the lead on the inside, then took back and shifted out on the turn, made a three wide bid off the turn to gain a short advantage but hung late. OBROTHER ITSYLVIA was settled early, advanced on the inside, eased off the inside leaving the five sixteenths, came four wide off the turn and loomed boldly but flattened out. VIOLENT PASS chased the pace two wide, came five wide into the lane and had no kick. ROCKET BLAST failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Annamated Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Premier Stable and Runnin Shoes Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, shift 2 wide, bid 3 wide upper, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, came 5 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Obrother Itsylvia
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, asvanced turn, eased out, came 4 wide, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Federal Case
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, inside 1/4 pole, finished well inside, got 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Tomater Gator
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2 wide, bid, clear turn, inside 1/4, headed upper, resurgent

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Blast
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 21 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POLITICAL was settled early, advanced two wide on the turn, eased out and came four wide into the lane, closed well on the outside and drew clear to prove best, driving. TRIPLE A. PLUS was four wide into the first turn, stalked the pace three wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to take over, then was headed by the furlong marker, dug in but could not go with the winner, held place award. CHARGING LION was well rated early, made a three wide move on the turn, loomed boldly off the turn and was between rivals by the furlong marker but flattened out. HE CAME TRUE steadied into the first turn, settled on the outside, three wide on the turn and weakened. ALL TIME CLASSIC set a pressured pace in the two path, between rivals by the half mile marker, then gave way on the turn. VISHNU pressed the pace on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Vishnu
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Political
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 2 wide turn, eased out, came 4 wide, bid,clear

ENTRY.NAME: He Came True
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied into first turn, settled 3-4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Triple A. Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide,led, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Charging Lion
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 3 wide move, between rivals 1/8, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: All Time Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, between rivals 1/2, weakened,
